work.name: Tencent
work.summary: Developed a predictive model for forecasting Peak Concurrent Users (PCU) of unreleased Steam games, aiding strategic investment decisions.
highlights: Designed a forecasting framework utilizing statistical and neural models to predict Daily Active Users (DAU) for competitor mobile games.
Explored applications of Large Language Models (LLMs) in narrative-driven text games, collaborating with production teams.
Mentored students in the Tencent Spark program, guiding hands-on projects and real-world Data Science applications.

work.name: Tencent
work.summary: Explored the Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) applications with LLM on games.
highlights: Developed an AI-driven text adventure game utilizing RAG capabilities.
Explored state-of-the-art LLM frameworks, including langchain and LlamaIndex.

work.name: University of California, Irvine
work.summary: Evaluated the performance of Multimodal LLMs on a custom sports video dataset.
highlights: Synthesized papers on video understanding datasets to contribute to a survey; Language and Multimodal Models in Sports: A Survey of Datasets and Applications.
